description:
Various speakers - Lightning Talks
[EuroPython 2016]
[18 July 2016]
[Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]

Lightning talks, presented by Harald Massa

-  Larry Hastings  - My life as a MEME
-  Javier Domingo - Python exp!
-  Danielle Procida - Python Adventures in Namibia
-  Radomes Dopiralski - Win Fabulous Prizes
-  Thomas Waldmann - Borg Backup
-  Lasse Schuirmann - Cola - Lint and Fix All Code
-  Tuna Vargi - argüman.org
-  Harry Percival & Fabian Kreutz - Sponsored Massage Training, in Aid of The Python Software Foundation
-  Michele Simionato - Thanks for the Python3 Statement
title: Lightning Talks 2016-07-18
